arabicText: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ إِذَا ٱلسَّمَاۤءُ ٱنفَطَرَتۡ

translations.en: WHEN THE SKY is cleft asunder,
translations.ar: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ إِذَا ٱلسَّمَاۤءُ ٱنفَطَرَتۡ

translations.en: and when the stars are scattered,
and when the seas burst beyond their bounds,
and when the graves are overturned –
every human being will [at last] comprehend, what he has sent ahead and what he has held back [in this world].

arabicText: یَـٰۤأَیُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلۡكَرِیمِ

translations.en: O MAN! What is it that lures thee away from thy bountiful Sustainer,
translations.ar: یَـٰۤأَیُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلۡكَرِیمِ

translations.en: who has created thee, and formed thee in accordance with what thou art meant' to be, and shaped thy nature in just proportions,

arabicText: فِیۤ أَیِّ صُورَةࣲ مَّا شَاۤءَ رَكَّبَكَ

translations.en: having put thee together in whatever form He willed [thee to have]?
translations.ar: فِیۤ أَیِّ صُورَةࣲ مَّا شَاۤءَ رَكَّبَكَ

translations.en: Nay, [O men,] but you [are lured away from God whenever you are tempted to] give the lie to [God’s] Judgment!
And yet, verily, there are ever-watchful forces over you,
Behold, [in the life to come] the truly virtuous: will indeed be in bliss,
whereas, behold, the wicked will indeed be in a blazing fire –
[a fire] which they shall enter on Judgment Day,
and which they shall not [be able to] evade.
And what could make thee conceive what that Judgment Day will be?

arabicText: ثُمَّ مَاۤ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا یَوۡمُ ٱلدِّینِ

translations.en: And once again: What could make thee conceive what that Judgment Day will be?
translations.ar: ثُمَّ مَاۤ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا یَوۡمُ ٱلدِّینِ

arabicText: یَوۡمَ لَا تَمۡلِكُ نَفۡسࣱ لِّنَفۡسࣲ شَیۡـࣰٔاۖ وَٱلۡأَمۡرُ یَوۡمَىِٕذࣲ لِّلَّهِ

translations.en: [It will be] a Day when no human being shall be of the least avail to another human being: for on that Day [it will become manifest that] all sovereignty is God's alone.
translations.ar: یَوۡمَ لَا تَمۡلِكُ نَفۡسࣱ لِّنَفۡسࣲ شَیۡـࣰٔاۖ وَٱلۡأَمۡرُ یَوۡمَىِٕذࣲ لِّلَّهِ
